articles.title: Will Nvidia Be Worth More Than Apple by 2030?
articles.content: Nvidia is growing faster than Apple right now, but will that be enough to help it overtake the world's most valuable company?

articles.title: Intel's AI PC Chips Are a Big Step Forward
articles.content: Meteor Lake has built-in AI hardware, beefier graphics, and improved power efficiency.

articles.title: 57.7% of Warren Buffett's $375 Billion Portfolio Is Invested in These 2 Dividend-Paying Stocks
articles.content: Buffett's holding company, Berkshire Hathaway, doesn't pay a dividend itself, but its equity portfolio is chock-full of dividend-paying stocks.

articles.title: These 3 Stocks Have Made Warren Buffett the Most Money in 2023. Are They No-Brainer Buys for the New Year?
articles.content: A few stocks have soared more than these three so far in 2023. But none have made the Oracle of Omaha more money.

articles.title: Why I'm Buying 30% Undervalued And 7% Yielding Verizon Heading Into 2024
articles.content: Verizon stands as a robust business, offering a well-covered 7% dividend yield. Find out why I rate VZ stock a strong buy.
